---
name: Feature Request / 功能请求
about: 为这个项目提出新功能建议 / Suggest a new feature for this project
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''

---

**功能请求相关的问题 / Problem Related to Feature Request**
您的功能请求是否与某个问题有关？请清楚、简洁地描述问题。
Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe clearly and concisely.
例如：我总是感到沮丧，当 [...]
Example: I'm always frustrated when [...]

**您希望的解决方案 / Desired Solution**
清楚、简洁地描述您希望发生什么。
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

**您考虑过的替代方案 / Alternatives Considered**
清楚、简洁地描述您考虑过的任何替代解决方案或功能。
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**预期收益 / Expected Benefits**
这个功能将如何改善用户体验或解决问题？
How will this feature improve user experience or solve problems?

**实现建议 / Implementation Suggestions** (可选 / Optional)
如果您对如何实现此功能有想法，请分享。
If you have ideas on how to implement this feature, please share.

**参考示例 / Reference Examples** (可选 / Optional)
如果其他应用有类似功能，请提供截图或链接作为参考。
If other apps have similar features, provide screenshots or links for reference.

**附加信息 / Additional Context**
在此处添加有关功能请求的任何其他上下文或截图。
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

**优先级 / Priority** (您的看法 / Your Opinion)

- [ ] 高 / High - 非常重要的功能 / Critical feature
- [ ] 中 / Medium - 有用的改进 / Useful improvement
- [ ] 低 / Low - 锦上添花 / Nice to have
